english.segment1: Maybe tonight we'll get back together. Sound the alarms and break all the levers. These streets are ours, our anthem rings. You'd know the truth if these walls could sing.
english.segment2: Amateur youth, sling down those signs. Gather the masses, friends of mine. I've got your back if you've got my hand. This isn't over, it just began.
english.segment3: If this isn't love, (If this isn't love). This is the closest I've ever been. Do you think we have a chance?. Tonight at streetlights, sing on Audrey's song.
english.segment4: If this isn't love, (If this isn't love). This is the closest I've ever been. Do you think we have a chance?. Tonight at streetlights, sing on Audrey's song.
english.segment5: Remind your parents, We're tomorrow. Lead with morals and we'll follow. When they wake up they'll see. That youth fades and glory days deceive.
english.segment6: What are you waiting for? Let's move on this. Time is of essence like your kiss. So say you're in. With cards down and guns drawn; this is it!
english.segment7: If this isn't love, (If this isn't love). This is the closest I've ever been. Do you think we have a chance?. Tonight at streetlights, sing on Audrey's song.
english.segment8: If this isn't love, (If this isn't love). This is the closest I've ever been. Do you think we have a chance?. Tonight at streetlights, sing on Audrey's song.
english.segment9: But now it stops at this. We could take it all if only we were rich. You can be what you can conceive. Red letters, kill your disbelief.
english.segment10: We all make mistakes sometimes. We all fail, but we stand tonight. Look past them and move on. We're all here; you're not the only one.
english.segment11: If this isn't love, (If this isn't love). This is the closest I've ever been. Do you think we have a chance?. Tonight at streetlights, sing on Audrey's song.
